name: Island Of Mine (alpha)
description:
Island Of Mine is a game that takes you to a mysterios island. Buy new lands to discover new ressources, dungeons, puzzles, npcs and many more. Gather ressources and defeat enemies to expand your town and upgrade your character.

This game is not finished yet. The current state of the game only represents around 5% of the full game. 

I appreciate any feedback. To share your feedback you can use:

- Google forms questionnaire

- Discord Server

- Comment section below
